attributes.action: Remove all VAT from women's sanitary products and incontinence products used by both sexes
attributes.additional_details: Remove the imposition of all VAT from 'women's sanitary protection products' (for example: sanitary towels, sanitary pads, panty liners, sanitary belts, tampons, keepers, and maternity pads), incontinence products used by both sexes, and any dual purpose product which protects against both menstrual/lochia flow and incontinence.
